title: (c) of that subsection as they relate to the bodies to which the following order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 31) (Health) (Designation) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 31) (health) (designation) order

title: (c) of that subsection as they relate to the bodies to which the following order
(c) of that subsection as they relate to the bodies to which the following order
heading: 2. Each body specified in the Schedule to this Order is, for the purposes of
text_raw:
2. Each body specified in the Schedule to this Order is, for the purposes of 
section 31 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 
2020 (No. 13 of 2020), designated and may hold hearings before it by remote 
hearing. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [533] 3 

Schedule 

Dental Council 

Health and Social Care Professionals Council 

Medical Council 

Mental Health Commission 

Nursing and Midwifery Board of Ireland 

Pre-Hospital Emergency Care Council 

Registration Boards established by section 26 or by regulation under section 4 
of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 

The Pharmaceutical Society of Ireland 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 November, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [533]

title: (c) of that subsection as they relate to the bodies to which the following order
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Instrument designates each body listed in the Schedule as a body for the 
purposes of holding remote hearings under section 31 of the Civil Law and 
Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [533] 5
